links.title: Apple never meant for you to spend so much time on your phone, Tim Cook says
links.description: Smartphone addiction is getting out of hand, according to the head of a company that's made a fortune on smartphones. Apple Inc. Chief Executive Tim Cook weighed in on excessive smartphone usage and other topics Monday, at Fortune Magazine's CEO Initiative event in San Francisco.

messages.body: $AAPL The company has already had the SE model at facilities in India. https://stocknews.com/news/aapl-apple-inc-aapl-looks-to-india-for-mass-production-and/

links.title: Apple Inc. (AAPL) Looks to India for Mass Production and Distribution of iPhone 6s
links.description: Apple Inc. (NASDAQ:AAPL) has started ramping up production of its iPhone 6s in overseas markets. To make it happen, the tech giant is leaning on a manufacturer and facility in which it has already cranked out a ton of phones. Economic Times has the details on Apple's production increase.
